response.overview: Recently divorced mom Lauren and widowed dad Jim let their friends push them into a blind date, which goes disastrously wrong. Unsurprisingly, neither wants to see the other ever again. However, fate intervenes when both Jim and Lauren, unbeknownst to each other, purchase one-half of the same vacation package at a South African resort for families, during spring break. They and their children are forced to share the same romantic suite and participate in a slew of family activities together.
response.tagline: Single dad, no clue. Single mom, flying solo.
response.title: Blended

results.name: Blended | Full Movie Preview | Warner Bros. Entertainment
